summary: This mod adds a new level 30 Khajiit Follower named Ji\'Kurah.
descriptionHtml: Ji\'Kurah is a level 30 Khajiit follower, he is competent and a strong fighter. He uses Steel Plate Armour and a Skyforge Steel Sword. In ranged combat he uses a bow. The rest doesn\'t really need explaining apart from the fact that Khajiit are awesome and this one somehow got in the city of Whiterun and he is chilling out in The Bannered Mare. Enjoy!
author: Maximus Newsome_Weeman991
